content:
cilium-dbg bpf multicast subscriber 
 Manage the multicast subscribers. 
 Options 
   -h, --help   help for subscriber
 
 Options inherited from parent commands 
       --config string        Config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
  -D, --debug                Enable debug messages
  -H, --host string          URI to server-side API
      --log-driver strings   Logging endpoints to use (example: syslog)
      --log-opt map          Log driver options (example: format=json)
 
 SEE ALSO 
 
 cilium-dbg bpf multicast 	 - Manage multicast BPF programs 
 cilium-dbg bpf multicast subscriber add 	 - Add a remote subscriber to the multicast group. 
 cilium-dbg bpf multicast subscriber delete 	 - Delete a subscriber from the multicast group. 
 cilium-dbg bpf multicast subscriber list 	 - List the multicast subscribers for the given group.
